#include<stdio.h>
#include<stdlib.h>
#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main ()
{
   long long  int n;
    cin>>n;
    while(n--)
    {
        long long int m;
        cin>>m;
        if(m==1)
            cout<<"0"<<endl;
        else
        {
          m=m-1;
        int str[100];
         int i=0;
         while(m!=0)
         {
             str[i]=m%5;
             m=m/5;
             i++;
         }
         int k=i-1;
         while(k>=0)
         {
             str[k]=(str[k])*2;
             k--;
         }
         int h=i-1;
         while(h>=0)
         {
            cout<<str[h];
            h--;
         }
         cout<<endl;
        }

    }
    return 0;
}
